data.name: Xuhivan's Autonomous Cube
data.detailed_description:
About This Game


This is the first version of the game I am working on, Xuhivans Autonomous Cube.

The game is a Roguelike Auto Battler, played on a twistable magic cube. Use the strengths and weaknesses of your units wisely to fight through a series of cubes, and reach the final boss before you exceed the number of allowed rotations. Battle different bosses and choose between relics and new units to improve your chances to remain victorious on this cubic battlefield.

Features

  • Multitude Of Different Units
  • Use Powerful Relics to Change the Nature of the Game in Your Favor
  • Fight Unique Bosses
  • Realistic 3D Graphics

Contact

If you want to contact me, go by the options linked on the side. And if you are an influencer, just let me know and I will give you access to the full game.

data.short_description: Xuhivan's Autonomous Cube is a Roguelike Auto Battler, played on a twistable magic cube. Use the strengths and weaknesses of your units wisely to fight through a series of cubes, and reach the final boss before you exceed the number of allowed rotations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-8500 @ 3.00 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are from the PC this game is tested on. Much worse PCs will do.
